page.title: 09Medical Care.
page.content: We are fortunate to have a good health care team consisting of a doctor,a health visitor with an assistant,a nurse, a midwife and the social services. The doctor is on call 24 hours. He visits the disabled,the chronic sick and the elderly who have difficulty in walking.A dispensary at the surgery saves journeys to the chemist in Henley.The district nursing sister visits the sick and teaches the family how to look after the ill.The midwife cares for mother and baby up to one month after birth.The health visitor is specially trained to give advice up to school age and also arrange meals on wheels.The social services provide home helps and arrange special visiting for the handicapped.Voluntary services provide meals on wheels and the British Legion transport people to hospital.
